tr.td: Please use the dropdown arrow to select the deposit % you would like to pay. Minimum Deposit to enroll is 20% of your total fees (i.e. 20% of your net proforma invoice fees as quoted after applying all the discounts you may be eligible for as a self-sponsored student).
